title: Soluno
description: Soluno is a powerful and easy-to-use cloud-based legal software that specializes in accounting, billing, trust, time/expense entry, and matter management. Law firms of all sizes can run their business with confidence from entry to invoice; while saving time, increasing productivity, and empowering their practice. Soluno is backed by 5-star support, and offers free conversions from 14 common industry solutions including PCLaw, Tabs3, and more.
